name: CbcObject
brief: Abstract base for branching entities (variables, SOS, etc.)

algorithms.name:
Branch-and-Bound: Branching Entity Interface
Copyright (C) 2002, IBM Corporation and others. All Rights Reserved.
This code is licensed under the terms of the Eclipse Public License (EPL).

CbcObject defines WHAT can be branched on:
- infeasibility(): Measure of violation (0 = feasible)
- feasibleRegion(): Bound tightening without branching
- createCbcBranch(): Create CbcBranchingObject for this entity

Derived classes: CbcSimpleInteger, CbcSOS, CbcClique, CbcNWay, etc.

CbcStrongInfo struct holds strong branching results:
up/down movement, infeasibilities, solver status.

Note: Current implementation assumes binary branching (2 arms).

see:
OsiObject for OSI-level base class

Edwin 11/12/2009 carved from CbcBranchBase
